entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Portable RID PublishAOT doesn't work from source-build VMR .NET 9 Preview 5 #41727
  • `dotnet workload install` in userlocal mode fails with source-build .NET 9 Preview 5 #41726
  • .NET Worker Project Fails on macOS When AssemblyName xml tag is provided and its value ends with .Service #41724
  • [Mac/Linux]After installing SDK 8.0.303 (July Update), wasm tools workload installation failed: Version 8.0.7 of package microsoft.net.runtime.webassembly.sdk is not found in NuGet feeds. #41715

Closed

  • [System.Threading.RateLimiting] Request Leaky Bucket rate limiter #41714

PullRequests

Created

  • Minimize container dependency redistribution #41740
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid redistributing MSBuild.dll #41739
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Stop generating useless .dll.configs #41738
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Minimize assemblies redistributed in Containers folders #41737
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow runtime binary into the VMR #41736
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix userlocal #41735
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Update ILLink team name #41734
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Set CI Job timeouts #41733
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid crossgen for Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.VisualBasic #41731
    untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #41716
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview6] Add warning when targeting net standard less then 2.0 #41710
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Preview 7 Branding #41704
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Unskip tests with Done issues + dotnet-format test fix #41684
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add warning when targeting net standard less then 2.0 #41660
    untriaged
  • Use Aspire 8.0 workload in the 9.0 SDK #41562
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Add Mono Stage 2 Leg to VMR SB #41606
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Onboard new inter-branch merge flow [Workflow] #41695
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Update Documentation to fix issues when running `zsh` #41668
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Refactor workload set and workload install/update logic #39991
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #41698
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
